item.title: Analyze WannaCry Ransomware with Diamond Model
item.description: In this blog post, will explore how wanna cry ransomware event can be mapped with Diamond model.

item.title: Diamond Model - Intrusion Analysis
item.description: Diamond model for intrusion analysis is used to analyze threats. It helps to set a structure and flow to threats so that analysts can control its effects. It may not be complete but sufficient enough to control the impact.
